// 获取翻译文本的函数
export const getTranslation = (key, language = 'zh') => {
  var _translations$languag;
  return ((_translations$languag = translations[language]) === null || _translations$languag === void 0 ? void 0 : _translations$languag[key]) || translations['zh'][key] || key;
};

// 多语言翻译配置
export const translations = {
  zh: {
    // Header
    search_placeholder: "搜索你感兴趣的内容...",
    home: "首页",

    guides: "主理人",
    publish: "发布",
    profile: "我的",
    
    // Culture Home

    culture_slogan: "感受少数民族文化魅力 · 体验村超激情 · 发现绝美景点",

    following: "关注",

    trending: "热门",
    
    // Culture Section

    learn_more: "了解更多",
    
    // Village Football

    huangguoshu_waterfall: "黄果树瀑布",
    huangguoshu_description: "中国最大的瀑布，也是世界著名大瀑布之一，被誉为'中华第一瀑'。",
    libo_description: "世界自然遗产地，被誉为'地球上的绿宝石'，拥有原始的自然风光。",
    xijiang_description: "世界最大的苗族聚居村寨，保存最完整的苗族'原始生态'文化。",
    zhaoxing_description: "全国最大的侗族村寨之一，被誉为'侗乡第一寨'。",
    
    // Guide Service
    exclusive_guide_service: "专属主理人服务",
    guide_service_slogan: "与当地文化传承人一起，深度体验贵州少数民族文化",
    selected_guides: "精选主理人",
    guide_description: "每位主理人都是当地文化的传承者和分享者",
    years_experience: "年经验",
    personality_traits: "性格特点",
    availability: "可预订时间：",
    recommended_routes: "推荐路线",
    book_now: "立即预订",
    
    // Booking Modal
    booking_confirmation: "预订确认",
    guide: "主理人：",
    route: "路线：",
    price: "价格：",
    duration: "时长：",
    name: "姓名",

    libo_description: "A World Natural Heritage site, known as the 'Green Emerald of the Earth', with pristine natural scenery.",
    xijiang_description: "The world's largest Miao settlement, preserving the most complete Miao 'primitive ecological' culture.",
    zhaoxing_description: "One of the largest Dong villages in China, known as 'The First Village of Dong Township'.",
    
    // Guide Service

    selected_guides: "Selected Guides",

    years_experience: " years experience",

    availability: "Available time: ",

    // Booking Modal

    guide: "Guide: ",
    route: "Route: ",
    price: "Price: ",
    duration: "Duration: ",
    name: "Name",
    contact_phone: "Contact Phone",
    travel_date: "Travel Date",
    people_count: "Number of People",
    special_requirements: "Special Requirements",
    total_price: "Total Price: ",
    cancel: "Cancel",
    confirm_booking: "Confirm Booking",
    booking_success: "Booking successful! The guide will contact you soon!",
    
    // Common
    per_person: "/person",
    people: " people",
    day: " day",
    nights: " nights",

// 获取翻译文本的函数
export const getTranslation = (key, language = 'zh') => {
  return translations[language]?.[key] || translations['zh'][key] || key;
};
